command.name: install
command.abstract: create routers, links and sessions from an AS-level topology

description.p: This command shall be used in combination with the command bgp topology loadbgp_topology_load. It is used to create a complete network based on an AS-level topology. C-BGP will create one BGP router for each AS and create links between these routers according to the relationships specified in the AS-level topology. C-BGP will also configure BGP sessions between the routers. C-BGP can also setup filters that correspond to the business relationships specified in the input file, using the command bgp topology policiesbgp_topology_policies.
